section.title: PLT.1.2 Who Should Read This Specification
其它Java平台规范
section.para: The following Java API specifications are referenced throughout this specification: • Java 2 Platform, Enterprise Edition, v1.4 (J2EE™) • Java Servlet™, v2.4 • JavaServer Pages™, v2.0 (JSP™) • The Java™ Architecture for XML Binding (JAXB) 2.0 These specifications may be found at the Java 2 Platform Enterprise Edition website: http://java.sun.com/j2ee/. PLT.1.5 Other Important References
